translation.en: [Sam] It's like we were doomed to destroy our planet.
translation.zh: 我们仿佛注定要毁灭我们的星球

translation.en: Some say it was because of the increasing pollution.
translation.zh: 有人说 这是因为不断加剧的污染

translation.en: I just call it human nature.
A few scientists predicted what would happen.
translation.zh: 一些科学家预测了未来会发生什么

translation.en: They started working on a power station that could be sent into space
translation.zh: 他们开始研发一种能量站 可以发送到太空中

translation.en: to harvest geothermal energy from other planets.
translation.zh: 收集来自其他星球的地热能

translation.en: People would start dying in their sleep...
translation.zh: 人们开始在睡眠中死去

translation.en: the blood in their veins turning black.
translation.zh: 血管中的血液变成黑色

translation.en: "An unexpected change in atmosphere composition," they said.
translation.zh: 他们说：“大气成分发生了意外变化”

translation.en: To me it was just our planet desperately trying to survive by kicking us out.
translation.zh: 我认为这只是因为我们的星球 想把我们踢走 为求生存而孤注一掷

translation.en: So one day, a hundred ships flew off into the sky.
translation.zh: 于是 有一天 一百艘飞船飞入太空

translation.en: They turned the power station into a colony,
translation.zh: 他们把能量站变成了殖民地

translation.en: like a lifeboat floating above Jupiter's volcanic moon,
translation.zh: 仿若一艘救生船 漂浮在唯一 有火山活动的木星卫星之上

translation.en: I'm looking at what appears to be rafts of mosquito
translation.zh: 我眼前的东西好像是大量的蚊子

translation.en: Something resembling blooms of black algae
despite minimal opportunity for chemosynthesis. Period.
translation.zh: 尽管化学合成的机会极少 完毕

translation.en: Level of toxicity in ambient atmosphere: severe.
translation.zh: 周围大气的毒性水平 很严重
样品181A 在水中快速发展的昆虫

translation.en: Found in a zone apparently in the presence of a strong concentration of ammonia.
translation.zh: 很显然 发现该昆虫的区域 氨气浓度很高

translation.en: Drawn from sediment strata, should confirm or disconfirm
translation.zh: 从沉淀物地层提取 应该可以确认或否认

translation.en: the presence of bacterium able to use ammonium as a main oxygen source.
translation.zh: 细菌的出现 能够使用铵作为主要的氧气来源

translation.en: "A shudder in the loin engenders there,
the broken wall, the burning roof and tower...
translation.zh: 只见那断了的墙垣 那燃起的穹顶和塔

translation.en: I can feel the wind blowing in my hair,
translation.zh: 我能感到风吹过我的发梢

translation.en: hear the sound of the waves crashing on the shore.
translation.zh: 听见海浪拍打海岸的声音

translation.en: [Sam] You won't believe what I discovered this morning.
translation.zh: 你不会相信我今早发现了什么

translation.en: Anaerobic reproduction in a water-striding insect colony.
translation.zh: 在水中快速发展的昆虫群落的 厌氧繁殖

translation.en: Imagine if the bees could adapt like those insects.
translation.zh: 想象一下 蜂蜜可以 像那些昆虫一样适应新环境

translation.en: It would prove that my dad is right.
Earth is not dying, it's being reborn.
translation.zh: 地球不是垂死 而是在重生

translation.en: I know things aren't easy on the IO Colony, but...
translation.zh: 我知道在艾奥殖民地上 并不好过 不过…

translation.en: From Earth until the end of the universe.
translation.zh: 从地球直到宇宙的尽头

translation.en: your scientific discoveries never cease to astound me.
translation.zh: 你的科学发现一直让我震惊

translation.en: Unearthing the last bits of life hanging onto that dying world...
translation.zh: 在那个垂死的世界上发掘残存的生命

translation.en: Imagine what you could find in a whole new galaxy.
translation.zh: 想象一下 在一个全新的星系里 你能发现什么

translation.en: Just a week from now, we'll have harvested enough of IO's volcanic energy
translation.zh: 一周后 我们会搜集足够多的 艾奥火山能量

translation.en: to power the entire New World Expedition fleet.
translation.zh: 给整个新世界远征船队提供能量

translation.en: Life is in the stars, Sam.
translation.zh: 星际中有生命存在 小珊

translation.en: Your father can't hold you back any longer.
translation.zh: 你父亲没办法继续阻止你

translation.en: Very soon, the last pocket of air on Earth will be gone.
translation.zh: 地球上残存的空气很快就会消失殆尽

translation.en: You both need to be on the next Exodus shuttle and come here.
translation.zh: 你们两个都需要 搭乘下一艘“撤离号”飞船来这里

translation.en: From IO until the end of the universe,
translation.zh: 从艾奥直到宇宙的尽头…

translation.en: The world we once called home appears to have turned against us.
translation.zh: 我们曾经称之为家园的世界 貌似转而跟我们作对

translation.en: However bleak the situation may seem, death is only a part of the process.
translation.zh: 无论情况显得有多么暗淡 死亡只是过程的一部分

translation.en: The fundamental principle of nature is survival.
translation.zh: 自然的基本法则是生存

translation.en: More than in our DNA, it is in our mind, in our soul,
translation.zh: 不仅在我们的DNA中 更存在于我们的心灵和灵魂中

translation.en: to seek life no matter what.
translation.zh: 无论如何 也要寻求生命

translation.en: Plant life has already evolved to resist ammonia toxicity.
translation.zh: 星球上的生命已经演变 可以抵制氨毒

translation.en: Once bees and other pollinators adapt,
translation.zh: 一旦蜜蜂和其他传粉昆虫适应新环境
我们的模型预测 不到20年内

translation.en: will decontaminate the air in less than 20 years.
We take to the stars in search of our salvation,
that we are already on the most significantly equipped spaceship.
translation.zh: 我们已经身处设备最完善的 宇宙飞船上
人们能够 而且最终会

translation.en: adapt and flourish again on our beautiful planet.
translation.zh: 再次适应我们这个美丽的星球 并且繁荣昌盛

translation.en: Don't lose yourself looking into the darkness of space.
translation.zh: 不要看着宇宙的黑暗而迷失了自己

translation.en: Your home is shining blue just in front of your eyes.
translation.zh: 你湛蓝的家园就在眼前

translation.en: Safe travels and hope to welcome you here among us soon.
translation.zh: 一路平安 希望能早日欢迎你加入我们

translation.en: [Harry] Generally, the queen bee is marked so she's easy to find.
translation.zh: 通常来说 蜂王身上有记号 所以很容易找到

translation.en: But sometimes she's replaced during a season.
translation.zh: 但有时在某个季节 它会被替代

translation.en: In thousands of bees, she blends in pretty well,
translation.zh: 它完美融入数千只蜜蜂中

translation.en: but if you look closely, you'll notice her thorax, her middle segment, is...
translation.zh: 但如果仔细看 你会注意到它的胸部 它中间的部分

translation.en: is not like the worker bees...

translation.zh: 这里有个特大的喜讯 小珊

translation.en: The council officially announced the first New World Expedition.
translation.zh: 委员会正式宣布了第一次新世界远征

translation.en: The exoplanet Proxima B really is a near-identical Earth twin.
translation.zh: 外行星比邻星b堪称地球的孪生星球

translation.en: It takes ten years to get there.
translation.zh: 需要十年才能到达那里

translation.en: All my friends are applying for the mission. They need engineers.
translation.zh: 我所有的朋友都申请参加这项任务 他们需要工程师

translation.en: But it has grave implications for the Exodus program.
translation.zh: 但它可能会对撤离计划产生严重影响
委员会的决定改变了一切
立即生效 所有宇宙飞船人员

translation.en: has been redirected to the New World Expeditions.
translation.zh: 都已被重新调配到新世界远征

translation.en: The Exodus shuttles that are on Earth right now
and will be the last ever sent to IO.
translation.zh: 它将是最后一艘被发射到艾奥的飞船

translation.en: You have to leave with your father, Sam.
translation.zh: 小珊 你得跟你父亲一起走

translation.en: The universe is calling for us.
[Sam] A giant storm hit our camp yesterday.
translation.zh: 昨天 一场巨大风暴 袭击了我们的营地

translation.en: My father's entire bee colony is gone.
translation.zh: 我父亲的整个蜂群 都消失了
我们所取得的所有进展

translation.en: I don't know what I'm supposed to do.
Even if I accept that you might be right about going to IO,
translation.zh: 你说去艾奥或许是对的 即使我接受这点

translation.en: we can't carry enough oxygen with the ATVs.
translation.zh: 我们的全地形车 也无法携带足够多的氧气

translation.en: I don't think we could ever make it to the launch site.
translation.zh: 我想我们根本到不了发射地点

translation.en: I'm here for Dr. Harry Walden.
translation.zh: 我是来找哈里沃顿博士的

translation.en: It's only cloudy like that because of the charcoal.
translation.zh: 因为碳的原因 水才很浑浊

translation.en: We filter our drinking water through sand and charcoal. It's all it needs.
translation.zh: 我们用沙和碳对水进行过滤 这样就够了
我是沃顿博士的研究助理

translation.en: I'm sure I can answer any of your questions.
translation.zh: 我肯定能回答你所有的问题

translation.en: I'm here to see Dr. Walden.
We haven't had anyone make the pilgrimage to see Dr. Walden in a long time.
translation.zh: 很久没人来拜访沃顿博士了
你来此是因为这个原因吧？

translation.en: Where did you say he was again?
translation.zh: 再问一次 你说他在哪里？

translation.en: He's off in the mountain right now,

translation.zh: 为了我们的工作收集样本

translation.en: I need you to take me to him.
I can't. I don't know his exact location.
translation.zh: 办不到 我不知道他的确切地点

translation.en: You're going to the final Exodus launch to IO?
translation.zh: 你要去最后一艘发送至艾奥的 “撤离号”飞船？

translation.en: It sure took you long enough to decide to leave Earth.
translation.zh: 你肯定花了很长时间 才决定要离开地球

translation.en: I'm not gonna take any of your food.
Yeah. I have an entire greenhouse.
translation.zh: 对 我有一整个温室

translation.en: Do you know if there's any animals left in the sea?
translation.zh: 你知道海中还有动物吗？

translation.en: I've always really wanted to go to the ocean.
You'd think they could live up high like us.
translation.zh: 还以为它们会像我们一样 活在很高的地方

translation.en: Yeah. Birds gotta land too, you know.
translation.zh: 嗯 鸟儿也得飞落到地上

translation.en: Have you ever seen a swan?
Yeah, when I was a kid..
I don't believe you. No way you could've seen everywhere.
translation.zh: 我才不信你 你不可能见过所有地方

translation.en: When is Dr. Walden getting back?
You have a lot of electronic equipment in here.
[Sam] We scavenge and salvage what we can from the zone.
translation.zh: 我们从禁区拾荒、抢救出物品

translation.en: [Sam] We're trying to establish a variant breed of honeybees
translation.zh: 我们试图培养一种蜜蜂的变种

translation.en: that can adapt to the toxic atmosphere.

translation.zh: 事实上 免疫遗传学真的很有意思

translation.en: No, right now. What are you doing right now?
translation.zh: 不 现在 你现在在干什么？

translation.en: What are you talking about? To who?
My friend Elon is an engineer
translation.zh: 我的朋友伊隆是工程师

translation.en: working on the solar cell mission to Alpha Centauri.
translation.zh: 参与飞往南门二的太阳能电池任务

translation.en: He can access the main transmission link between Earth and IO.
translation.zh: 他能访问地球和艾奥之间的 主要传输链接

translation.en: You're gonna have to sleep in here tonight.
Dr. Walden's work is very important and I can't have you interfering.
translation.zh: 沃顿博士的工作很重要 我不能让你打扰他

translation.en: It's his office and living quarters.
translation.zh: 那是他的办公室兼宿舍

translation.en: When he's not here, I play the tape.
translation.zh: 他不在的时候 我就播放录音带

translation.en: So he's been gone more than two days?
translation.zh: 所以他离开不止两天了？

translation.en: It's nice to meet you, Sam.

translation.zh: 想让自己有用武之地吗？

translation.en: I have to repair a broken solar panel too.
translation.zh: 我也得修复坏掉的太阳能板

translation.en: Should be able to seal it, but it'll never put out as many amps as it used to.
translation.zh: 应该可以封住 但它永远都发不出以前那么多电流了

translation.en: [Micah] You do a lot of work around here.
translation.zh: 你在这里要做很多事情
看不起很不错 对吧？

translation.en: [Sam] So, you know my friend Elon I mentioned before?
translation.zh: 我之前跟你提过我的朋友伊隆 你知道吗？

translation.en: Well, he is, but he's, you know, more than that.
translation.zh: 他是的 不过他… 不止是朋友这么简单

translation.en: What about you? Do you have a wife?
I guess you must think it's stupid.
translation.zh: 我猜想你肯定觉得这样很蠢

translation.en: Do you think it's absurd to love someone that's millions of miles away?
translation.zh: （致琼恩） 你认为爱一个远在天边的人 很可笑吗？

translation.en: So ancient is the desire for one another which is implanted in us.
translation.zh: 渴求对方的这种欲望古已有之 深植我们的内心
与我们的原始本性重聚

translation.en: seeking to make one of two
and healing the state of man.
And they were happy like that.
so the gods split us in two as punishment.
translation.zh: 所以众神把我们一分为二 以示惩罚

translation.en: Tore us away from our other halves.
He said each of us, when separated,
translation.zh: 他说 分开以后 我们每个人

translation.en: is always looking for our other half.
translation.zh: 总之在寻找我们的另一半

translation.en: But when one is met with this other half...
translation.zh: 当一个人与自己的另一半相遇

translation.en: the pair are lost in an amazement of love,
translation.zh: 两人迷失在美妙之中 充满爱

translation.en: And one will not be seen out of the other's sight.
human nature was once originally one.
translation.zh: 人性 最初 属于一个人

translation.en: And the desire and the pursuit of the whole...
You know a lot about this stuff.
translation.zh: 你对爱的知识很渊博嘛

translation.en: I was gonna be a teacher...
I wasn't gonna tell you this...
translation.zh: 我没打算告诉你这件事的

translation.en: Bees used to do almost all the pollinating, but...
translation.zh: 以前授粉基本由蜜蜂来完成 不过

translation.en: now I have to do it all by hand.
Corn provides the structure for the beans to climb,
translation.zh: 玉米提供大豆攀爬的结构

translation.en: squash spreads out over the soil like mulch,
translation.zh: 南瓜像护根一样在土壤上蔓延

translation.en: and that keeps the moisture in.
And then the beans provide the nitrogen in return.
translation.zh: 然后作为回报 大豆会提供氮气

translation.en: E to the i pi plus one equals zero.
translation.zh: e的i乘以圆周率次方加1等于0

translation.en: But this one's my absolute favorite. It's, uh...
translation.zh: 但这是绝对是我最喜欢的 是…
诺瓦克的可演化性公式

translation.en: Symbols on the left represent all possible strings of molecules
translation.zh: 左边的符号代表所有可能的分子株

translation.en: and symbols on the right represent selection pressures and fitness ratings.
translation.zh: 右边的符号代表选择压力和适合比率

translation.en: Basically that just means, um... all that's necessary for life to emerge
translation.zh: 总的来说 这表示 生命出现所必须的东西

translation.en: are molecules subject to forces of selection and mutation.
translation.zh: 是受选择和变异力量制约的分子

translation.en: If those conditions are met, self-replication emerges.
translation.zh: 如果符合这些条件 自我复制就会出现

translation.en: Don't you see how important that is? I mean...
translation.zh: 你没意识到这有多重要吗？我是说…

translation.en: What about the markings on your rib cage?
translation.zh: 你肋骨上的记号是怎么回事？

translation.en: Uh... It's nothing. It's just something we do as part of our research.
translation.zh: 没什么 只是我们研究工作中的一部分

translation.en: We do it to build up our immunity.
translation.zh: 我们这样做是为了增强免疫力

translation.en: IO was just a last resort.
translation.zh: 艾奥只是万不得已的选择

translation.en: [Harry] Planet Earth is a miracle in the universe.
We are its caretakers, and it is our duty to stay...
translation.zh: 我们是地球的守护者 有义务留下来

translation.en: stay and fight for our world.
translation.zh: 留下来 为了我们的世界而战

translation.en: Humans may have nearly destroyed our home,
translation.zh: 人类或许险些就毁掉了我们的家园

translation.en: but we can make it habitable again
translation.zh: 但我们能让地球再度适合居住

translation.en: and we will breathe the air again.
The strong, brave souls that will stay,
translation.zh: 坚强勇敢的人会留下来

translation.en: if any do choose to stay,
will become a new civilization of its own design.
translation.zh: 会成为一种拥有自己构造的全新文明

translation.en: [man] A special thanks to Dr. Walden.
that this will be our final program
translation.zh: 这将是我们最后一期节目

translation.en: due to the shut down of all broadcast television from midnight tonight.
translation.zh: 因为从今晚午夜起 所有的电视播出都将停止

translation.en: There is too much to say,
and I will end the program as I have every day for the last eight years.
translation.zh: 我会像过去八年来的每一天一样 结束本期节目

translation.en: From all of us, to all of you...
translation.zh: 我们所有人向所有观众说…

translation.en: [Sam] For a long time, you must've thought it was the right thing to do.
translation.zh: 很久以来 你肯定认为这样做是对的

translation.en: [Sam] I think you were really brave.
My dad would have thought so too.
translation.zh: 我爸肯定也会这么认为

translation.en: So I see you found my parents' old bedroom.
translation.zh: 看来你找到了我父母以前的卧室

translation.en: [Micah] Your mother's name was June, right?
translation.zh: 你母亲叫“琼恩” 对吗？

translation.en: What did he do to her?
What did Dr. Walden do to cause your mother's death?
translation.zh: 沃顿博士做了什么 害死了你母亲？

translation.en: [Micah] But he kept her here, right?
translation.zh: 但他让她留在这里 对吗？
-他让你们所有人留在这里 -不是的

translation.en: Sam, she died because he kept her here.
translation.zh: 小珊 他让她留在这里 她才会死

translation.en: I have a lot of work to be doing.
It's not worth it, you continuing my experiments.
translation.zh: 你继续我的实验 这样不值得

translation.en: Dad, what are you doing in here?
translation.zh: 爸 你在这里做什么？
这里是我的实验室 对吗？

translation.en: You shouldn't be in here, not without your oxygen.
translation.zh: 没有氧气 你不该进来

translation.en: You don't need to take care of me anymore. I'm fine.
translation.zh: 你没必要继续照顾我了 我没事

translation.en: If there was a discovery, a miracle discovery, I would've found it.
translation.zh: 如果有发现 奇迹般的发现 我肯定已经找到了

translation.en: I'm not talking to you about that.
translation.zh: 我不想跟你谈这个话题

translation.en: Don't underestimate the power of human connection.
translation.zh: 别低估人类沟通的力量

translation.en: You used to say that about science.
translation.zh: 你以前是这样说科学的

translation.en: Sam, we have to leave this place.
translation.zh: 小珊 我们必须离开这里

translation.en: Sooner or later you'll have to.
[Sam] My dad buried my mom here.
I buried him here beside her.
I'm sorry I yelled at you.
translation.zh: 我冲你嚷嚷 对不起

translation.en: I have to tell you something, Sam, and you're not gonna like it.
translation.zh: 我得告诉你一件事 小珊 你不会喜欢的

translation.en: I've decided I'm taking you to Exodus.
translation.zh: 我已决定我要带你去“撤离号”

translation.en: And I can get you there in the balloon.
You won't understand it now, but it's not up for debate.
translation.zh: 你现在不会理解 但此事不容争辩

translation.en: You've got your entire life ahead of you.
And I'm not gonna leave you here alone.
translation.zh: 我不会让你一个人留在这里

translation.en: Do you understand what I'm saying?
I'm taking you away from here.
You're going to IO and you're never coming back.
translation.zh: 你要去艾奥 永远不会回来

translation.en: We'll have to plot our course and wait for favorable wind conditions,
translation.zh: 我们必须设计好路线 等待有利的风向条件

translation.en: but it has to be soon.
We've a long way to travel and we're running out of days.
translation.zh: 路途很遥远 我们时日不多

translation.en: A traveler arrived at the Enclave today in a helium balloon.
translation.zh: 今天 有个旅人乘坐氦气球到达净土

translation.en: I'm not even sure where he's from or how he's survived this long on Earth.
translation.zh: 我甚至不确定他来自何方或 他如何能在地球上活这么久

translation.en: He's offered to take me to Exodus.
My life on Earth is over.
translation.zh: 我在地球上的生活结束了

translation.en: It's been over for a long time.
We'll finally be together on IO, just like you've always wanted.
translation.zh: 我们终于会在艾奥上相聚 正如你一直期望的那样

translation.en: Are there oceans on Centauri B?
I really need to hear from you.
translation.zh: 我真的需要收到你的来信

translation.en: We're gonna have to wait for the wind to change direction before we can leave.
translation.zh: 我们得等风转向 这样才能离开

translation.en: What were you gonna do if I hadn't shown up here, Sam?
translation.zh: 小珊 如果我没出现 你打算怎么办？

translation.en: You know, people aren't meant to be alone.
You think I don't know that?
I'll go and get the rest of them.

translation.zh: 我发现它们时是这样的

translation.en: I think it's trapped under that grate.
translation.zh: 我想它大概被困在格栅下面

translation.en: The holes are big enough to let the workers and drones through,
translation.zh: 洞很大 工蜂和雄蜂可以穿过来

translation.en: but they're too small for her.
She must have just hatched, which means she's a virgin queen.
translation.zh: 它肯定才刚刚孵化 这表示它是处女蜂王

translation.en: thank God you made the decision to travel to the Exodus launch.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 你决定去“撤离号”发射地点

translation.en: I'm sorry I haven't been able to write sooner,
but there's been a change here as well.
Yesterday my commanding officer asked me to join
translation.zh: 昨天 我的指挥官叫我

translation.en: the first New World Expedition shuttle.
I hope you of all people will understand that I had no choice.
translation.zh: 希望你能了解我别无选择

translation.en: but it won't be for many, many years.
Please write back before you leave.
translation.zh: 在你离开之前 请给我回信

translation.en: All transmission links with Earth will be cut after the final Exodus launch
translation.zh: “撤离号”发射之后 跟地区之间的所有传输链接将被切断

translation.en: and I am desperate to receive one last letter from you before I leave.
translation.zh: 在我离开之前 迫切想收到你的最后一封来信

translation.en: from IO until the end of the universe,
translation.zh: 从艾奥 直到宇宙尽头…

translation.en: I'm sure your father told you what it was like.
translation.zh: 你父亲肯定告诉过你是怎样的

translation.en: I want to know what it was like for you.
translation.zh: 我想知道你觉得是怎样的

translation.en: I grew up in the suburbs.
By the time I was old enough, I was in the city every chance I got.
translation.zh: 长大之后 我一有机会就会去城里
我们没做好准备承受这一切

translation.en: No matter what warning we got from people like your father.
translation.zh: 无论你父亲这种人发出任何警告

translation.en: What we saw with our own eyes.
The future we got was unthinkable.
translation.zh: 我们获得的未来不堪设想

translation.en: Unexpected things can be good too.
translation.zh: 出乎意料的事情也有可能是好事

translation.en: We'll never be able to get off the ground if the wind doesn't change.
translation.zh: 如果风向不改变 我们永远不可能起飞

translation.en: [Sam] Do you see the glimmer? To the left of Jupiter?
translation.zh: 你看到那一丝微光吗？ 木星的左边
事实上 它围绕艾奥旋转

translation.en: but the Colony's so much brighter in the sky that IO becomes obscured.
translation.zh: 但殖民地在空中很耀眼 让艾奥变得模糊不清

translation.en: I never thought I'd see it.
translation.zh: 我从未想到我能看到它

translation.en: art exhibit I really wanted to see.
translation.zh: 艺术展 我真的很想看

translation.en: It's one of the last exhibits from before.
translation.zh: 来自以前的最后一批艺术展

translation.en: Would you have taught your students about myths?
Is that the same as saying forever?
The space between us will become more vast until it's too far to cross.
translation.zh: 我们自己的空间会变得更大 直到遥不可及 无法跨越

translation.en: He's been dead for a long time now.
It was my decision, all along,
translation.zh: 一直以来 留在地球上

translation.en: I think we're both looking for worlds to call our own...
translation.zh: 我想我们都在寻找属于自己的世界
但愿你能找到属于你的世界
由于灾难性的天气事件

translation.en: Exodus shuttle number 127 is unable to launch.
Your departure has been changed to Exodus 134
translation.zh: 您的起飞已转至““撤离号”134号飞船

translation.en: Exodus shuttles will begin embarkation in 26 hours and 12 minutes.
translation.zh: “撤离号”飞船 将于26小时12分钟后起飞

translation.en: What are you talking about? Is that a problem?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？这会有麻烦吗？

translation.en: We don't have enough helium to fly that far!
translation.zh: 我们没有足够多的氦可以飞那么远！

translation.en: You wanna know why I really came here?
translation.zh: 你想知道我来这里的真正理由吗？

translation.en: Your father told us to stay on Earth.
translation.zh: 你父亲叫我们留在地球上

translation.en: I saw dozens of people starve to death because of him.
translation.zh: 我看到数十个人因为他饿死

translation.en: Food would have kept her alive for a few more days, but...
translation.zh: 如更有食物 她可以多活几天 不过…

translation.en: Then the food would have been gone.
I hid rations so I could survive.
translation.zh: 我把定量供应的食品藏起来 这样我就可以活下来

translation.en: so I could be the survivor.
So I came here to find him.
And all I found was you instead.
I won't make the same mistake twice and let you die too.
translation.zh: 我不会再次犯同样的错误 让你也死去

translation.en: Thank you for telling me, Micah.
translation.zh: 谢谢你告诉我这一切 麦卡

translation.en: I know where we can get helium.
translation.zh: 我知道上哪可以找到氦气

translation.en: It's farther than I've ever gone.
translation.zh: 比我去过的任何地方都远

translation.en: We'd have to stay longer than I've ever stayed before.
translation.zh: 我们必须在那里待很久时间 超过我以往停留的时间

translation.en: We'd need to stay the night there.
Transmitting on a frequency 90.43 kilohertz daily.
translation.zh: 每日在在90.43频率上进行传输

translation.en: If anyone's still listening to these broadcasts...
translation.zh: 如果依然有人听这些广播

translation.en: my father, mentor, and best friend,
On October 13th of last year, I buried him next to my mother.
translation.zh: 去年10月13日 我把他葬在我母亲旁边

translation.en: You ever been to this part before?
Should work. It's just a big open field.
translation.zh: 应该管用 只是一片很大的空地

translation.en: We'll drop the balloon there. Then we'll go get the helium.
translation.zh: 我们把气球降落在那里 然后去取氦气

translation.en: I just need you to focus.
translation.zh: 我只是需要你集中注意力

translation.en: We mess up and we die.
translation.zh: 如果我们搞砸 就会死

translation.en: [Sam] This afternoon, I'll be leaving our enclave
translation.zh: 今天下午 我们会离开净土

translation.en: to travel to the Exodus launch site.
If anyone's receiving this broadcast, I implore you to do the same.
translation.zh: 如果任何人收到这则广播 我恳求你也这样做

translation.en: We thought we could find a way for humans to survive on Earth.
translation.zh: 我们本以为我们能找到方法 让人类在地球上得以存活

translation.en: This is Sam Walden, over and out.
translation.zh: 我是珊沃顿 通话完毕

translation.en: Let's drop the balloon and get moving. We've got a lot of ground to cover.
translation.zh: 我们把气球放下 继续走 路途遥远

translation.en: -What? -There's a lot of helium in here.
[Micah] But that's a good thing, right? It's why we came.
translation.zh: 但这是好事 对吗？ 我们来这里就是因为这个原因

translation.en: All right. We get a few more, and then we camp here for the night.
translation.zh: 好了 我们再拿几个 然后在这里扎营过夜

translation.en: It's getting too dark to travel.
[Sam] So you know how life started on this planet?
translation.zh: 你知道这个星球上的生命 是怎么开始的吗？

translation.en: They came out of the ocean, and here we are...
translation.zh: 它们从海洋里出来 人类就这样诞生了

translation.en: at the very end of this cycle.
[Micah] Do you realize that you might be the last woman to live on Earth?
translation.zh: 你意识到你或许是最后一个 在地球上生活的女人吗？

translation.en: [Sam] I'm sure there are other people alive.
working hard to find our new home,
translation.zh: 努力工作 以找到我们的全新家园

translation.en: where you won't need a gas mask to take me to a restaurant.
translation.zh: 在那里 你带我去餐厅吃饭时 不用戴防毒面罩

translation.en: [Sam] Once we switch to fresh tanks,
translation.zh: 我们一旦换了新的氧气罐

translation.en: we turn the air valve down 50%.
[Sam] "A shudder in the loins engenders there.
So mastered by the brute blood of the air.
translation.zh: 就来自他天上的兽性魔血

translation.en: Did she put on his knowledge with his power
translation.zh: 在被冷漠的鸟嘴 放下之前

translation.en: before the indifferent beak could let her drop?"
translation.zh: 她汲取了他那充满力量的头脑？”

translation.en: A face that launched a thousand ships.
translation.zh: 她的脸引发了 一场千艘战舰参加的战争

translation.en: She was considered the most beautiful woman in the world.
translation.zh: 她被认为是世上最美的女人
她被特洛伊王子帕里斯

translation.en: Leda was related to the gods.
Leda gave birth to God's children.
Your father would be proud of you.
You're gonna have to go on your own.
We can talk about it at the launch site.
Everyone sees so much death here...
translation.zh: 每个人在这里看见如此多的死亡

translation.en: Why are you doing this, Sam? Change your tank.
translation.zh: 你干嘛这样做 小珊？把氧气罐换了

translation.en: If I survive, tell everyone on IO that there's a future on Earth.
translation.zh: 如果我活下来 告诉艾奥上的所有人 地球上有未来

translation.en: my father loved the T.S Eliot quote,
translation.zh: 我父亲喜欢TS艾略特的一段语录

translation.en: and the end of all of our exploring
will be to arrive where we started
and know the place for the first time."
translation.zh: 这时才算第一次认识它”

translation.en: We have learned to fear our planet
translation.zh: 我们懂得了惧怕我们的星球

translation.en: and fled to the stars in search of a new one.
translation.zh: 飞到星际寻找新的星球

translation.en: But the fascination for other worlds
could not turn my eyes away from the beauty of our home.
translation.zh: 无法让我无视我们家园的美丽

translation.en: The waves are crashing on the shore...
and the wind is blowing in my hair.
Tell them the dark clouds have given way to the ocean mist.
translation.zh: 告诉他们乌云散尽 薄雾笼罩海洋

translation.en: Tell them a new world awaits us.
translation.zh: 告诉他们一个全新的世界等着我们

translation.en: Tell them we're waiting for you.
Waiting for you to come back.
